Operation 'GetListRoles' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details. Summary is too generic. The description is comprehensive and includes pagination details, but the summary should reflect the paginated nature of the response to help AI agents understand the operation's specific behavior. The description already covers output details and pagination mechanism.

data.current_description: Returns a list of License Manager [roles](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/roles--7HKK5Uau2H6wxE1rH5oRbc). The response is divided in pages. The query parameter `numItems` defines the number of items in each page, and consequently the amount of pages for the whole list.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve paginated list of License Manager roles
data.reasoning: Summary is too generic. The description is comprehensive and includes pagination details, but the summary should reflect the paginated nature of the response to help AI agents understand the operation's specific behavior. The description already covers output details and pagination mechanism.

message: Operation 'Createnewappkey' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details. Summary uses abbreviated terminology ('appKey') inconsistent with full form used elsewhere. Description is too brief and lacks information about what is returned and how the credentials are used. Enhanced version clarifies the purpose, return values, and use case for AI agent understanding.

data.current_description: Creates a new pair of `appKey` and `appToken`.
data.summary_suggestion: Create new application key and token pair
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new application key and token pair for programmatic access to the License Manager API. Returns both the appKey and appToken credentials that must be used together for authentication. These credentials enable machine-to-machine authentication for integrations.
data.reasoning: Summary uses abbreviated terminology ('appKey') inconsistent with full form used elsewhere. Description is too brief and lacks information about what is returned and how the credentials are used. Enhanced version clarifies the purpose, return values, and use case for AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'Updateappkey' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details. Summary is vague about the specific action (activate/deactivate). Description lacks clarity about required inputs (ID parameter and request body structure). Enhanced version specifies the exact action, required parameters, and the operational effect for better AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description: Activates or deactivates an `appKey` by its ID.
data.description_suggestion: Activates or deactivates an application key by its ID. Requires the appKey ID as a path parameter and a request body specifying the desired status. This operation controls whether an application key can be used for authentication without deleting it.
data.reasoning: Summary is vague about the specific action (activate/deactivate). Description lacks clarity about required inputs (ID parameter and request body structure). Enhanced version specifies the exact action, required parameters, and the operational effect for better AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description: Retrieves the stores of the account and their respective hosts.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve account stores and their host information

message: Operation 'GetUser' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details. Original summary is too generic. Description lacks clarity about what data is returned and doesn't mention the response structure. Added specificity about return value and permission context for better AI agent understanding.

data.current_description: Allows you to get a user from the database, using the `userId` as the identifier.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a specific user's information from the License Manager database using their unique `userId` identifier. Returns the user object containing details such as email, name, and user ID. Requires appropriate License Manager permissions (Remove user, Save user, or Find user by email resources).
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic. Description lacks clarity about what data is returned and doesn't mention the response structure. Added specificity about return value and permission context for better AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'delete_/api/license-manager/users/{userId}' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_side_effects. Summary is too vague and doesn't convey the permanence of the action. Description lacks information about side effects (data deletion, permission removal) and the irreversible nature of the operation, which is critical for AI agents to understand the consequences.

data.current_description: Allows you to delete a user from the database, using the `userId` as the identifier.
data.description_suggestion: Permanently removes a user from the License Manager database using their unique `userId` identifier. This operation deletes all associated user data and access permissions. The deletion is irreversible. Requires appropriate License Manager permissions (Save user or Remove user resources).
data.reasoning: Summary is too vague and doesn't convey the permanence of the action. Description lacks information about side effects (data deletion, permission removal) and the irreversible nature of the operation, which is critical for AI agents to understand the consequences.

message: Operation 'GetListUsers' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details. Summary lacks specificity about pagination. Description doesn't clearly explain what data is returned in each user object or mention the pagination metadata structure. Added clarity about return value structure and required permissions for AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description: Returns a list of registered users. The response is divided in pages. The query parameter `numItems` defines the number of items in each page, and consequently the amount of pages for the whole list.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve paginated list of all users
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of all registered users in the License Manager. The response is divided into pages controlled by the `numItems` query parameter, which specifies the number of users per page. Returns user objects with pagination metadata. Requires the 'Get paged users' License Manager resource.
data.reasoning: Summary lacks specificity about pagination. Description doesn't clearly explain what data is returned in each user object or mention the pagination metadata structure. Added clarity about return value structure and required permissions for AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'PutRolesinUser' has semantic quality issues: missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Summary is adequate. Description lacks information about what happens as a result of adding roles (permission grants) and what is returned. Missing clarity about the side effect of granting access to resources. Enhanced description explains the consequence of the operation for better AI agent understanding.

data.current_summary: Add roles to user or appKey
data.current_description: Allows you to add License Manager [roles](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/roles--7HKK5Uau2H6wxE1rH5oRbc) to a particular user or application key by specifying the list of role IDs on the request body.
data.description_suggestion: Adds one or more License Manager roles to a specific user or application key by providing a list of role IDs in the request body. This operation grants the specified roles' permissions to the target user or appKey, enabling access to corresponding License Manager resources. Returns the updated user/appKey with their new role assignments. Requires the 'Save user' License Manager resource.
data.reasoning: Summary is adequate. Description lacks information about what happens as a result of adding roles (permission grants) and what is returned. Missing clarity about the side effect of granting access to resources. Enhanced description explains the consequence of the operation for better AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'GetRolesbyUser' has semantic quality issues: missing_output_details. Summary is clear and adequate. Description is too brief and doesn't specify what data is returned (role structure/properties). Added clarity about return value structure and the specific resource required for better AI agent interpretation.

data.current_summary: Get roles by user or appKey
data.current_description: Retrieves License Manager [roles](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/roles--7HKK5Uau2H6wxE1rH5oRbc) of a particular user or application key.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all License Manager roles assigned to a specific user or application key identified by `userId`. Returns a list of role objects containing role IDs, names, and associated permissions. Requires the 'Find user by email' License Manager resource.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and adequate. Description is too brief and doesn't specify what data is returned (role structure/properties). Added clarity about return value structure and the specific resource required for better AI agent interpretation.
